patient_info: Compulsive behaviors,Delayed speech and language development,Poor suck,Postnatal growth retardation,Infantile muscular hypotonia
golden_diagnosis: Prader-Willi 综合征/Prader-Willi syndrome; PWS/Prader-Willi syndrome/Prader-Willi syndrome,Prader-Willi 综合征/Prader-Willi syndrome; PWS/Prader-Willi syndrome/Prader-Willi syndrome,Prader-Willi 综合征/Prader-Willi syndrome; PWS/Prader-Willi syndrome/Prader-Willi syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Prader-Willi Syndrome (PWS)
2. Angelman Syndrome
3. Cri-du-chat Syndrome
4. Down Syndrome
5. Rett Syndrome
6. Cornelia de Lange Syndrome
7. Williams-Beuren Syndrome
8. Smith-Magenis Syndrome
9. Fragile X Syndrome
10. Ataxia-Telangiectasia

Each of these conditions can present with a combination of developmental delays, hypotonia, growth retardation, and behavioral or feeding issues similar to those described in the patient's phenotype. It is important to note that a precise diagnosis would require a thorough clinical evaluation, including genetic testing, when applicable.
